title: AIIMS Jodhpur Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 06 Research Scientist and Other Posts
description: The All India Institute of Medical Sciences Jodhpur (AIIMS Jodhpur) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 06 Research Scientists, Laboratory Technicians, Multi-Tasking Staff, and Research Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the BDS, MBBS, B.Sc, M.Sc, M.Phil, Ph.D, MS/ MD can grab this chance and apply for the AIIMS Jodhpur Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, appl...
